snippet: Garry Kasparov, the chess champion and opposition politician, on Thursday won a ruling against the Russian government for an illegal arrest at a Moscow rally in 2007.
abstract: Russian opposition politician Gary Kasparov wins ruling against Russian government in European Court of Human Rights for his illegal arrest at rally in Moscow in 2007.
lead_paragraph: Garry Kasparov, the chess champion and opposition politician, on Thursday won a ruling against the Russian government for an illegal arrest at a Moscow rally in 2007.

headline.main: Russia: A Legal Victory for Kasparov
headline.print_headline: Russia: A Legal Victory for Kasparov

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
